synopsis.text: This captivating short film is the brainchild of a unique collaboration between renowned artist loundraw and popular music band BUMP OF CHICKEN, created as part of the 'TOHO Animation Music Films' project, marking TOHO animation's decade-long journey in the industry. The film features the soulful melody of BUMP OF CHICKEN's song 'Tentai Kansoku' and is directed by none other than loundraw himself. The narrative revolves around a young boy who pens heartfelt letters to himself, placing them in a homemade letterbox. The story unfolds as we witness tender moments between the boy and his girlfriend, including a poignant farewell scene under a starlit sky as she prepares to move away with her family. Fast forward two years, the couple finds themselves reunited under the same celestial canopy, rekindling their shared love for stargazing.
